Part 5 Roost and nest sites The following map shows the locations where birds spend the night. IMPORTANT Roost = A bird temporarily spending a night at a location but moving frequently Potential nest = A bird returning to the same location through time (across multiple days and weeks) 5.0.1 Nighttime roost movement summary If a birds night-time roost is does not change then the average roost spacing will be very low (<0.5 km - green rows). We should also look at the data where the average roost spacing is <1km (orange rows). All other rows are white: 5.0.1.1 Costa Rica name roost_spacing_km Fossey 0.0 Mufasa 0.7 Sherekhan 0.7 Clifford 0.9 Dustin 0.9 Messi 0.9 Robinhood 1.0 Pedro 1.1 Sonqoy 1.2 Frosty 1.4 Elvis 1.7 Kingkong 1.7 Spazzino 1.8 Bonnie 2.1 Steve 2.4 Dizzy 2.7 Rocky 2.8 Charizard 2.9 Ziggy 2.9 Nekhbet 3.0 Tupac 3.1 Flaps 3.2 Carolina 3.6 Wenceslas 4.7 Siegfried 5.1 Elizabeth 5.3 Moskovits 5.4 Buzzie 5.9 Charles 6.4 Kingdavid 7.0 You can see the distribution of the nightime locations with the following map.
